original: @75a * // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @75a * // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya manydzu shr'i sto tra /
analyzed: a'arya manydzu shr'i sto tra /
translated: Ārya-Mañjuśrī-Stotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la bstod pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la bstod pa /
translated: Praise of Ārya Mañjuśrī

original: 'phags pa @75b 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa @75b 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Ārya Mañjuśrī.

original: dpal gyi 'byung gnas 'jam dpal kun gyi dpal //
analyzed: dpal gyi 'byung gnas 'jam dpal kun gyi dpal //
translated: The source of glory, the glory of all Mañjuśrī,

original: mtha' dag byams pas khyab pas 'jam pa'i dang // 'jam dang dpal du grags pas don dang ldan //
analyzed: mtha' dag byams pas khyab pas 'jam pa'i dang // 'jam dang dpal du grags pas don dang ldan //
translated: Gentle due to being pervaded by love, and with a gentle and glorious renown, meaningful.

original: 'jam dpal yang dag dpal la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: 'jam dpal yang dag dpal la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise Mañjuśrī, the perfect glory.

original: gzhon nu'i sku mdog gser mdangs 'od lam 'bar //
analyzed: gzhon nu'i sku mdog gser mdangs 'od lam 'bar //
translated: The youthful body, golden in color, radiant with light,

original: rin chen mchog gis brgyan pas sa le spa //
analyzed: rin chen mchog gis brgyan pas sa le spa //
translated: Adorned with the best of jewels, shining brightly,

original: byin chen dang ba'i thugs mnga' 'dzum pa po //
analyzed: byin chen dang ba'i thugs mnga' 'dzum pa po //
translated: With a mind of great generosity, smiling,

original: gzi brjid mdzes dang ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: gzi brjid mdzes dang ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Beautiful with majestic splendor, I pay homage and praise.

original: yon tan gter gyi autpal phyag na bsnams //
analyzed: yon tan gter gyi autpal phyag na bsnams //
translated: Holding a blue lotus, a treasure of good qualities,

original: padma rgyas pa'i snying po'i gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: padma rgyas pa'i snying po'i gdan la bzhugs //
translated: Seated on a seat of the heart of a blooming lotus,

original: lha yi cha lugs lha las khyad par 'phags //
analyzed: lha yi cha lugs lha las khyad par 'phags //
translated: With the attire of a god, superior to the gods,

original: lta bas mi skyo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: lta bas mi skyo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Never tiring of looking, I pay homage and praise.

original: gzhon nu sgeg pa'i tshul du gda' mod kyi //
analyzed: gzhon nu sgeg pa'i tshul du gda' mod kyi //
translated: Although you appear in the manner of a youthful prince,

original: ye shes thogs med mnga' bas kun mkhyen pas //
analyzed: ye shes thogs med mnga' bas kun mkhyen pas //
translated: You are omniscient, possessing unobstructed wisdom,

original: sems can don la nan tan don du gnyer //
analyzed: sems can don la nan tan don du gnyer //
translated: And you strive for the benefit of sentient beings.

original: 'gro ba mtha' dag sgrol la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: 'gro ba mtha' dag sgrol la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, the one who liberates all beings.

original: gzhon nu sprul pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad la //
analyzed: gzhon nu sprul pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad la //
translated: The major and minor marks of your emanated youth

original: gang gis yud tsam mthong bas 'dun pa skye //
analyzed: gang gis yud tsam mthong bas 'dun pa skye //
translated: Inspire devotion in those who merely see them.

original: gang la cis 'dul de ltar sprul mdzad pa //
analyzed: gang la cis 'dul de ltar sprul mdzad pa //
translated: You emanate in whatever way is necessary to tame beings,

original: thabs kyis 'dren pa'i mang la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: thabs kyis 'dren pa'i mang la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: And skillfully guide them. I pay homage and praise you.

original: bsam rtogs spros la dben pas sangs rgyas brnyes //
analyzed: bsam rtogs spros la dben pas sangs rgyas brnyes //
translated: By being free from conceptual elaborations, you attained buddhahood.

original: yod med rtag chad mtha' la mi gnas shing //
analyzed: yod med rtag chad mtha' la mi gnas shing //
translated: You do not abide in the extremes of existence, nonexistence, permanence, or annihilation,

original: gnyis med mnyam pas chos kyi tshul la gnas //
analyzed: gnyis med mnyam pas chos kyi tshul la gnas //
translated: And by being nondual and equal, you abide in the way of the Dharma.

original: yang dag don gyi mchog la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: yang dag don gyi mchog la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, the supreme one with the true meaning.

original: khyod ni chos dbyings zab mo'i 'byung gnas te //
analyzed: khyod ni chos dbyings zab mo'i 'byung gnas te //
translated: You are the source of the profound dharmadhatu,

original: yi ge smra bas rtogs pa'i yul med kyang //
analyzed: yi ge smra bas rtogs pa'i yul med kyang //
translated: And although the domain of realization cannot be expressed in words,

original: 'dul ba'i dbang gis cho 'phrul gzugs ston pa //
analyzed: 'dul ba'i dbang gis cho 'phrul gzugs ston pa //
translated: You display miraculous forms through the power of those to be tamed.

original: dam pas mthong bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: dam pas mthong bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the one who sees the sublime.

original: tshul bzhin ma yin yid la byed pa spangs //
analyzed: tshul bzhin ma yin yid la byed pa spangs //
translated: Abandoning improper mental activity,

original: rigs pas dgon par gyur pa'i thabs la dben //
analyzed: rigs pas dgon par gyur pa'i thabs la dben //
translated: In the solitude of the forest, with skillful means,

original: ye shes bdud rtsi'i char gyis brlan mdzad cing //
analyzed: ye shes bdud rtsi'i char gyis brlan mdzad cing //
translated: The one who moistens with the rain of nectar-like wisdom

original: byang chub myu gu skyed la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: byang chub myu gu skyed la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: And causes the sprouts of enlightenment to grow, I pay homage and praise.

original: byams chen 'gran zla med pa dag gi dbang //
analyzed: byams chen 'gran zla med pa dag gi dbang //
translated: The one who, with unrivaled great love,

original: mtshan mar spros pa'i rtsod pa tshar bcad de //
analyzed: mtshan mar spros pa'i rtsod pa tshar bcad de //
translated: Conquers the disputes of conceptual elaboration

original: zhi ba mi g-yo dbyings su 'dzud mdzad pa //
analyzed: zhi ba mi g-yo dbyings su 'dzud mdzad pa //
translated: And leads to the peaceful, immovable expanse,

original: 'jig rten ded dpon mchog la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: 'jig rten ded dpon mchog la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the supreme guide of the world.

original: dbang mkhyen chen po shes rab ral gri yis //
analyzed: dbang mkhyen chen po shes rab ral gri yis //
translated: The one who, with the sword of great wisdom and power,

original: lta ba dman pas bslad pa'i dra ba 'dral //
analyzed: lta ba dman pas bslad pa'i dra ba 'dral //
translated: Cuts through the net of defilements from inferior views

original: bag yangs mi rtog dbyings su yun du bzhugs //🔽skye dgu bde bar 'god @76a * //
analyzed: bag yangs mi rtog dbyings su yun du bzhugs // skye dgu bde bar 'god @76a * //
translated: And abides for a long time in the expanse of carefree non-conceptuality,

original: la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Establishing beings in happiness, I pay homage and praise.

original: khyod ni chos dbyings zab mo'i 'byung gnas te //
analyzed: khyod ni chos dbyings zab mo'i 'byung gnas te //
translated: You are the source of the profound dharmadhatu,

original: gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis gang la yang //
analyzed: gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis gang la yang //
translated: In the twelve branches of scripture, the sutras,

original: gang du khyod kyis gsungs pa lhag par zab //
analyzed: gang du khyod kyis gsungs pa lhag par zab //
translated: Where you taught the most profound.

original: chos nyid don mchog ston la phyag 'tshal bstod //🔽dngos po mtshan mar chags pa'i dug 'thungs pas //
analyzed: chos nyid don mchog ston la phyag 'tshal bstod // dngos po mtshan mar chags pa'i dug 'thungs pas //
translated: I pay homage and praise the one who reveals the supreme meaning of dharmata.🔽Sentient beings who have drunk the poison of attachment to substantial characteristics,

original: sdug bsngal nad kyis brgyal ba'i sems can rnams //🔽gnyis med rang bzhin mya ngan 'das ston pa //
analyzed: sdug bsngal nad kyis brgyal ba'i sems can rnams // gnyis med rang bzhin mya ngan 'das ston pa //
translated: Are overcome by the sickness of suffering.🔽I pay homage and praise the one who reveals the nature of non-duality and nirvana,

original: bdud rtsi stobs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: bdud rtsi stobs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: And bestows the nectar of immortality.

original: ma rig rmongs pas bslad pa'i mun rum nas //
analyzed: ma rig rmongs pas bslad pa'i mun rum nas //
translated: In the darkness of delusion and ignorance,

original: thar ba'i dus med mu cor 'khyams pa la //🔽ye shes sgron ma'i 'od kyis gsal mdzad nas //
analyzed: thar ba'i dus med mu cor 'khyams pa la // ye shes sgron ma'i 'od kyis gsal mdzad nas //
translated: Without any chance of liberation, wandering aimlessly,🔽The light of the lamp of wisdom illuminates,

original: snang bas thar par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: snang bas thar par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: And through that light, liberation is attained. I pay homage and praise.

original: yon tan rdzogs te btsal bar bya men pas //🔽thugs rjes thugs dam btsan par gyur pa yang //
analyzed: yon tan rdzogs te btsal bar bya men pas // thugs rjes thugs dam btsan par gyur pa yang //
translated: Since the qualities are perfect and need not be sought,🔽Compassion becomes the powerful commitment.

original: brtson 'grus skyo ba mi mnga' srid pa sel //
analyzed: brtson 'grus skyo ba mi mnga' srid pa sel //
translated: Diligence is free from weariness, and existence is eliminated.

original: sems can mtha' dag sgrol la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: sems can mtha' dag sgrol la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the one who liberates all sentient beings.

original: sems can mthun par srid pa mi 'dor zhing //
analyzed: sems can mthun par srid pa mi 'dor zhing //
translated: Without abandoning existence in accordance with sentient beings,

original: ji ltar nyes pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa //
analyzed: ji ltar nyes pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa //
translated: Just as a lotus is not soiled by the faults of the mud,

original: 'dam nas padma gsal bar 'byung ba ltar //
analyzed: 'dam nas padma gsal bar 'byung ba ltar //
translated: So you are unsullied by the faults of the world.

original: skyon med dag pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: skyon med dag pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Homage and praise to you, O faultless one!

original: sems can zad pa'i mtha' ni dpag dka' ste //
analyzed: sems can zad pa'i mtha' ni dpag dka' ste //
translated: The end of the exhaustion of sentient beings is difficult to fathom,

original: srid pa stongs par thugs dam bcas pa yis //
analyzed: srid pa stongs par thugs dam bcas pa yis //
translated: But you have vowed to empty existence.

original: yon tan des na byang chub gzhan las 'phags //
analyzed: yon tan des na byang chub gzhan las 'phags //
translated: By that quality, your enlightenment is superior to others.

original: thugs rje mthu stobs che la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: thugs rje mthu stobs che la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Homage and praise to you, whose compassion is powerful!

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la khye'u bcu drug gis bstod pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la khye'u bcu drug gis bstod pa rdzogs so//
translated: The praise of the sixteen youths to noble Mañjuśrī is complete.
